thread.title: At Baltimore Museum, It’s Simon Time
thread.title_full: At Baltimore Museum, It’s Simon Time - The New York Times

author: Matt Beardmore
title: At Baltimore Museum, It’s Simon Time
text:
After an 11-month run at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum in Cleveland, the “ Paul Simon : Words & Music” exhibition opens Oct. 11 at the Jewish Museum of Maryland in Baltimore . It will be there through Jan. 18 before continuing its nationwide tour.
